The WHAT-WG Web Forms 2.0 supports GET/PUT/POST and DELET=
E

http://www.whatwg.org/specs/web-forms/current-work/#methodAndEnctypes

X=
mlHttpRequest as currently implemented in both IE and Mozilla
supports any =
method. WHAT-WG is standardizing it in Web Applications
1.0:

http://www.wh=
atwg.org/specs/web-apps/current-work/#xmlhttprequest
